about_the_game:
"Getting Inside" is a light visual novel that will absolutely brighten up your evening. Follow the plot, make your choices, and discover the hottest sex scenes.
Can you seduce all the women? Which ending will you come to?
Go and play! 🔥



You are an ordinary loser whose life unexpectedly changes when an ancient demon breaks free and lures you into a world of sexual pleasure and deadly passion. In return, he wants only one thing from you... Oh. Wait. Well, he doesn't want anything from you. He just seems to be having fun. 😈

Embark on a journey filled with comedy and overpowering lust. Change your life and become the one who the most stunning girls fall for.

But are they as naive and simple as our blissfully ignorant and lustful protagonist thinks?.. 👀






🔥 up to 20 different animations, including animated sex scenes and characters
🔥 unique visual style with various effects and character voice acting
🔥 dynamic plot with different endings
🔥 5 hours of gameplay filled with passion, humor, and mysticism
🔥 6 detailed female characters for every taste




PS: Yes, we use AI. But our artists are carefully working on it, cleaning out all the bugs and giving the drawings an individual style. I hope this doesn't stop you from enjoying the game. ❤️

content_descriptors.notes:
All participants are of legal age and express their consent. 
It contains sexual acts, nudity, scenes of BDSM and public sex.

name: Getting Inside: Hentai Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 🔥 “Getting Inside” is a visual novel where devilishly seductive beauties aren’t shy about crawling into your zipper. Is it nothing more than a lucky coincidence, though? Find out exactly what demonic forces have fallen on your head and use them wisely! 🔥
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
